---
category: news
title: "What patients are willing to pay more for in healthcare"
excerpt: "The survey asked respondents to rank factors that affect their healthcare provider choice with regard to cost. 1. Fifty-seven percent said they would pay more for quality of care. 2. Forty-seven percent said they would pay more for the ability to work with a care team of choice."
